resources.string: CREATE TABLE Field ( Name TEXT, Address TEXT, fk_Plant INT, FOREIGN KEY (fk_Plant) REFERENCES Plant(_id) )
CREATE TABLE Plant ( Name TEXT, fk_Technology INTEGER, FOREIGN KEY (fk_Technology) REFERENCES TechnologyMap(_id) )
CREATE TABLE TechnologyMap ( Name TEXT, Month INTEGER, ProcessingTime INTEGER, FuelNeeded INTEGER )
CREATE TABLE Worker ( Name TEXT, Age INTEGER, fk_Qualification INTEGER, FOREIGN KEY (fk_Qualification) REFERENCES Qualification(_id) )
CREATE TABLE Qualification ( Name TEXT, Salary INTEGER )

CREATE TABLE RequiresQualification ( fk_TechnologyMap INTEGER NOT NULL, fk_Qualification INTEGER NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (fk_TechnologyMap) REFERENCES TechnologyMap(_id), FOREIGN KEY (fk_Qualification) REFERENCES Qualification(_id) )
